argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ldualvadd.f | |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) |
| 2 |  | ldualvadd.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 3 |  | ldualvadd.a | |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | ldualvadd.d | |- D = ( LDual ` W ) |
| 5 |  | ldualvadd.p | |- .+b = ( +g ` D ) |
| 6 |  | ldualvadd.w | |- ( ph -> W e. X ) |
| 7 |  | ldualvadd.g | |- ( ph -> G e. F ) |
| 8 |  | ldualvadd.h | |- ( ph -> H e. F ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oF .+ |` ( F X. F ) ) = ( oF .+ |` ( F X. F ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9 | #P_ldualfvadd | |- ( ph -> .+b = ( oF .+ |` ( F X. F ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ph -> ( G .+b H ) = ( G ( oF .+ |` ( F X. F ) ) H ) ) |
| 12 | 7, 8 | #P_ofmresval | |- ( ph -> ( G ( oF .+ |` ( F X. F ) ) H ) = ( G oF .+ H ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( G .+b H ) = ( G oF .+ H ) ) |
